iterations.failure_reason: Rule hit but no new signatures
improvement_suggestions: Relax the pattern matching by introducing wildcards ( `?` ) at positions where slight variations are expected.  Instead of fixed skip offsets, consider removing the `skip` action altogether or using a more adaptive approach if skipping is critical. A more robust approach would involve analyzing the surrounding code context to determine appropriate skip targets dynamically.
